Question
========

Five pure coins are thrown up at the same time. Set the chance variable *X* = the number of heads that come up. Then what is the probability of *X* = 1?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,00
* 0,10
* 0,16
* 0,50

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,00: Incorrect
* 0.10: Incorrect
* 0.16: Correct
* 0.50: Incorrect
